attributes.action: introduce legislation (AGAIN, THAT'S THE 'WHAT WE WANT HIM TO DO' BIT) to change the tax laws of this country so that  taxpayers may have his/her tax liability reduced by 10% every time there is an incident where human rights laws, when invoked by criminals, have been used to incur unnecessary additional expenditure of taxpayer pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not right that taxes should be taken from the innocent under threat of criminalisaton and for those taxes then to be used in protecting the human rights of the criminal fraternity.  Every time an incident like the recent hugely wasteful ferrying of a criminal 120 miles to avoid violating his human right not to be seen in public in handcuffs occurs then the taxpayers of this land should have their annual income tax bill reduced by 10%.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
